SEO_TITLE: Gabriel Ichiro - Systems Engineer and Web Developer
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Contact us to create your web and mobile system.

ABOUT_ME.INTRO: My name is Gabriel Ichiro. I started getting interested in technology at an early age trying to make video games with C++. Currently, I am working as a full stack developer with an interest in cybersecurity.
ABOUT_ME.ACHIEVEMENTS: Some of my achievements include winning 2nd place in the Hackacom of Comteco and participating and ranking in the top 5 of the national cybersecurity competition of AGETIC.
